magineer:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
magineer:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

magineer:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
magineer:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
magineer:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

magineer:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
magineer:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

magineer:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
magineer:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !magineer:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

magineer:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
magineer:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !magineer:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
